scopecontent.p: Manuscript recipe book of Lizzie Martin includes not only recipes for preparing meats, pastries, and sauces, but also practical remedies for all household emergencies. The book functioned not only as a cook book, but also as a first-aid handbook with cures for anything from hiccups to insomnia, and aids for removing a fish bone from the throat, for rheumatism, for removing stains from marble, and ink from carpet. 182 pages + index (21 pages)
